divs: sighting detailsmy family, my mother(alice greene), my two sisters(tanya hoffman & evelyn pearson) and my son jordan sechrist, were outside in the vacant lot next to my mothers' house. we had a pit fire going and were just having fun. someone, i don't remember who, said that there were some stars moving in the sky. we all looked up and saw a number, 7 or more what looked like stars, but more brighter, moving is different directions. they were moving back and forth, up and down and sideways. they were definitely, not airplanes. there was no noise. they didn't change size or color. i was using my mother's cell\camera to take video of the objects. after about 5 minutes, 4-5 jets, we thought they might be military, came from the south and chased the ufo's to the north. then we saw the jets coming back from the north and the ufo's were chasing the them. then we didn't see them again.
Summary: My family and I were outside next to my mothers house and we saw a number of starlike objects moving in the sky - they were chased off my military jets.
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
